p: The effects of cannabis on pain mechanisms are probably responsible for the medical interest in this substance. In human medicine, cannabinoids such as CBD and THC are being used for the treatment of epilepsy and the management of pain and inflammation associated with osteoarthritis and spasms associated with multiple sclerosis (MS) [ 32].
